comment1: username is the name other users are going to use to send you messages
comment2: web_gui allows you to use DarkMessenger from your browser as a web app if you prefer it over commandline
comment4: hidden_service_address is the local address binded to your .onion. Allows you to recive messages routed from tor network
comment6: If allow_addme is set to true, you will allow anyone to request be added to your contact list
comment7: If add_back is set to true, you will automatically add back to your contact list anyone that requested you to add him remotelly
comment8: if alert_on_new_messages is true You will receive a terminal notification when someone sends you a new message
